roleset.name: put into without invitation
roleset.note: INTRUDE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'intrude' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 48.1.2. (from intrude.01-v predicate notes)
INTRUSION-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to intrude.01. Intrude.01 is a member of VN class reflexive_appearance-48.1.2. No FN class.Framed by Katie. (from intrusion.01-n)

example.name: all args
example.text: Mary intrudes her low opinion of John's personal hygiene into every conversation.
example.arg: her low opinion of John's personal hygiene

example.text: Personally, I think this is an intrusion into the bar culture by Ald. Schumacher
